# Linking vegetation structure, plant traits and bee traits

## General overview

This repository contained the R script used to extract the bee trait information used in the paper by Machida et al. in preparation. This is the result of the first chapter of my Ph.D. thesis started in 2021 at the Universidade Federal de Goiás/Brazil.

```{r, echo=FALSE, out.width="90%",fig.align="center"}

```
